file_content.text: Who are you? Who are you?
Havoc Squad, General. You'll be seeing more of us down the line.
The best in the Republic.
Yes. I'm going to make sure of that.
I'm the one who blew up that big, expensive toy of yours.
Do you remember the Gauntlet?
I should've known. Who else would storm in but the one responsible for this unfortunate situation?
You will face justice for what you've done. My men's sacrifice will be avenged--and the Emperor's justice will be served.
I'm coming for you next, Rakton.
See you soon. [Shoot the holo]
We're saved! The Republic has saved us! Thank you, thank you!
Shut your mouth, traitor. You don't even deserve to breathe the same air as the rest of us.
These cowards were signing up with Rakton--they traded their planets to the Empire in exchange for lifetime leadership positions.
Did you really join up with the Imps?
Is this true?
What choice did we have? Our lives were at stake--our people's lives!
Charge each other with treason later--we need to get out of here.
Sort this out later.
No, please! Hear us out!
We had no choice. We had to put the welfare of our people first--it's our duty as their leaders.
Betrayed the Republic, huh? That wasn't very nice of you.
I don't like traitors.
We... we had to! We must be loyal to our people first and foremost. Their lives are our responsibility!
Don't hide behind your people. You gave up. You betrayed everything that we've fought for--alliances we've all held for generations.
We are at war--we don't have room for cowards or traitors. You deserve to be executed.
Agreed. Give these traitors what they deserve. If anyone asks, we'll say the Imperials murdered them.
In the Republic, the accused stand trial. They aren't executed on a whim.
No!
They might be cowards, but we caught them before any real harm was done.
Agreed. Only by adhering to our own laws and principles can we hope to stand apart from the Empire and ultimately defeat it.
Their crime seems plain enough to me, but I defer to your wisdom, Major.
Whatever you say. If someone said they'd take the heat for me, and they didn't? I'd frag 'em and find someone else.
I'm under orders to bring all of you back alive.
That isn't my mission.
That's right. Let the Senate sort them out--we've done our job here.
We're soldiers, sir, not executioners. You will be well within your rights to bring formal charges against these men upon return to Republic space.
Rest assured, traitors, that if our mission parameters did not stand paramount, I would gladly grind you both into a cowardly paste!
You'll have to forgive the major. Wouldn't want any splotches on that perfect record.
We are at war. We should not suffer allies who cannot be depended upon.
This will never happen again. Now that we've seen Imperial diplomacy firsthand, I don't think we'll take part in any future "summits."
Now you can appreciate what the Republic offers.
I'm glad to hear it.
We'll never betray the Republic again. Never.
Don't bother reassuring me. I just work here.
Save it for the trial.
Yes. Of course, whatever you say.
Cross the Republic again, and it will be your bodies on the floor.
We'll be watching you.
We understand! We will remain loyal until the day we die, we swear it!
This is what happens when you betray the Republic.
Die, traitors. [Kill them]
Agh!
Ugh!
Are you insane? This was supposed to be a rescue mission, not a trial and execution!
Major! This is unthinkable! You had no right to do what you've done--none at all.
Thus to all traitors! Long live the Republic!
We are at war with the Sith Empire. We cannot waste time on cowards or traitors.
Good move, boss. Now--who's hungry?
I think I'd like nothing more than to leave this miserable place. I wonder if my man Helik ever turned up--do you know where he is?
Good riddance. We need leaders and allies who will stand with us against the Empire.
Can we get off this miserable station now? Where's my man Helik, did he ever turn up?
I sent Helik and the rest of your crews to hold out with my squad.
Affirmative, he's here.
Last I saw, he was in the crew lounge.
Affirmative, he's here.
Your man snuck my team aboard. Thank him for your rescue.
Helik is a hero.
Find him yourself. And then get out of here before reinforcements show up.
I'm not your servant.
Yuun, come in. Operation complete. Bring the ship up to the crew area and drop Helik and the others off.
Affirmative, Major. Yuun will arrive momentarily.
Come in, Yuun. Mission complete. Unlock the crew area so our allies can regroup with their associates.
Affirmative, Major. Yuun will also bring the ship to the crew area to facilitate a quicker return to General Garza.
We owe you our lives, soldier. The Republic has proven how much it values us as allies. It's time we returned the favor.
Tell your leaders that starting now, no Imperial will set foot on our worlds without paying in blood. Long live the Republic!
Long live the Republic!
Focus your fire! Don't let up!
Attack pattern nine! Go!
Unit one, suppressive fire! Unit two, flank! Flank!
You've made a wise choice. Embracing the Imperial way of life will bring prosperity and security to your floundering worlds.
Thank you, General. You've... given us a great opportunity, and we appreciate it.
Indeed. It's unfortunate that your colleagues couldn't be persuaded to--guards! Security breach! Engage protocol two-seven, immediately!
Weapons on the floor, people--now!
Surrender!
Servants of the Emperor never surrender.
It's funny, us bumping into each other like this, General.
Hello to you, too.
I'm sure you can explain what you mean from the inside of an Imperial prison cell.
I'm taking the hostages. Get in my way, and you're a corpse.
Don't try to stop me.
Who are you? You're going to get us all killed!
Guards--execute!
